name: 栄冠は君に レジェンドパック
description: High school baseball simulation. Become a coach and aim for Koshien! Fourth in the Artdink Legend Pack series. This game is only available in Japanese.
minimum_requirements: OS: Japanese Windows 8（32 & 64bit）/ 7（32 & 64bit）/ Vista（32bit） / XP Graphics: DirectX9.0 compatible graphics Sound Card: DirectX9.0 compatible sound Additional Notes: Mouse & Keyboard
